typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> blobstgemployee
blobstgemployee alterRow(upsertIf(true()),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Column_1'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
